___
### Requirement or improvement
- Can Skywalking support search by tag in trace page?
author: aix3

comments.body: We don't support that. I will cause a lot of payload, most are unnecessary.

@wu-sheng Has this task been added to the 6.5. X milestone? The existing schemes are to modify TraceSegment.java, add tag storage, and store tag to traceid at the same level. Does the working group have a better plan?
No, this is not a feature to be added.
@wu-sheng As a skywalking developer, do you have any good suggestions on how to implement this function?
If you want, could extend an index to save the tags and trace id, then query that index first and get all traces based on the results.
@liangxp Can I ask your solution about this question?

My understanding is that distributed tracing is automatically managed by the SkyWalking SDK, which relieves users of any additional handling. Currently, the log panel already supports content-based searching, which is quite satisfactory for our needs.

For frontend logs, we also require the ability to search by content. For instance, if a user reports encountering a white screen while using the app, we need the capability to search for logs related to that specific user in the log panel to facilitate issue localization.

However, due to the limitations of the current version of the frontend log panel's search functionality, our plan is to leverage the /v3/logs API to report frontend error logs. By doing so, these logs will be displayed in the backend log panel, effectively meeting our troubleshooting requirements. This approach ensures that we can effectively diagnose and address issues.

title: What the sampling mechanism is
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ √] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
I want to know what the sampling mechanism is? For example, I have 3 services and are distributed in different nodes. The calling relationship is A->B->C. When I configure the sampling to 300, if a call A is acquired, B and C will be collected. Is it still possible that in a call chain, A and C are collected, B is discarded, and the actual call chain becomes A->C?
If this is the latter case, the configuration of the sample may cause the call chain displayed on the web interface to be missing or incorrect.

我想了解一下采样的机制是什么？例如我有3个服务，并且分布在不同的节点，调用关系为A->B->C；当我配置采样为300时，如果某一次调用A被采集，B和C一定会被采集？还是有可能在一次调用链中，A和C被采集到，B被丢弃，实际调用链就成了A->C?如果是后一种这样的话，配置采样之后就有可能导致在web界面显示的调用链缺失或者不正确

___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
 skywalking v6.20
- Which company or project?

- What happen?
If possible, provide a way for reproducing the error. e.g. demo application, component version.

___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: liyanyan-dev

comments.body: This wouldn't happen, if the trace segment has been sampled, then all upstream trace segments will be sampled automatically.

> This wouldn't happen, if the trace segment has been sampled, then all upstream trace segments will be sampled automatically.

1.What's the mechanism? Assume B was sampled firstly, how does A know that the B was sampled and then sample itself?
2.Does skywalking support tail-based sampling? Since tail-based sampling captures all outliers so that you don’t miss crucial trace data when you are troubleshooting a performance issue.

1. I was saying upstream service, the context propagated, that is why upstream knows.
2. Tail sampling is not supported, because the cost has been made in the downstream, this wouldn't have much help. SkyWalking could easily support 100% sampling in the product env, and various sampling mechanism in the OAP server side. We can't see the real requirement for the tail sampling. And tail sampling is inevitable to fail when MQ or async involved, which would be quite confused for the users.

title: got traceId "N/A" in the class extends ZuulFilter under 6.4.0
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
got traceId "N/A" in the class extends ZuulFilter under 6.4.0, how to solve this problem?

___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
Skywalking 6.4.0, CentOS 7.x, JDK 1.8, 8C CPU, 16G RAM

- Which company or project?

- What happen?
upgraded from 6.3.0 to 6.4.0, our gateway using Zuul, get traceId in the class extends ZuulFilter, it is ok under 6.3.0, but get traceId "N/A" under 6.4.0, debug step into found out the segment is null, how to solve this problem?

___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: jadezhong

comments.body: Segment is null, meaning, there is no tracing context, so span created. Do you check wich plugin should generate span? Please check our supported list, and make sure you have the plugins you need.
@wu-sheng question is error only if i use the agent of 6.4.0, it is always ok before that version.
`N/A` is not the error, it means no one created the span before you call`#getTraceId`, nothing more.
@wu-sheng i know, but still i don’t know why upgrade from 6.2.0/6.3.0 to 6.4.0 will cause that? Isn’t it should keep functionality consistently? or in another word “Backwards compatible”?
@wu-sheng currently we fully upgraded to 6.4.0. to make TraceContext.traceId() right, we revert the agent back to 6.3.0, but still this is very awkward.
@wu-sheng found out this problem caused by apm-sniffer/apm-sdk-plugin/undertow-plugins/undertow-2.x-plugin under 6.4.0, it is ok when i use the one under 6.3.0.
get undertow-2.x-plugin from 6.3.0, package it and upload it onto server's .../agent/plugins/, test and no conflict.
ps., we use 1.4.* undertow.
We can't verify in every case. If you think there is an issue, I think it is better to fix and send pull request. There are too many possibilities for plugin.

I couldn't see any "cooling down" in this log as well.
Are you using the 6.3.0+ agent? The reboot doesn't exist before that.

I am sure my version is 6.3.0. agents won't re-register after "OutOfMemoryError" occurred in server, and I couldn't see the "cool down" in the logs. It still doent's re-register so far.   I am going to give it a try for the 6.4.0 version observing whether or not it still have the same problem.
What do you expect after `OutOfMemoryError`? This is hard to say. Re-register is not for this case.

The situation is when "OutOfMemoryError" occurred, I rebooted the server. I expect agents can re-gister by themselves without rebooting them, but it didn't work. maybe in "OutOfMemoryError" situation, re-register is not support. Am i meaning right?
That is no `re-register`, that should be called as `reconnect`, because you are talking about gRPC level connection. This has an issue in 6.3.0, YES. We have fixed it in 6.4.0 release.
I see, thank you so much. I'll give it a shot right way.

title: how transmit traeid when customize filter in springcloud gateway?
body:

### Question
- What do you want to know?
   when I customize filter in springcloud gateway 2.1.4,in the filter ,I modify the request header,add some paramters, the tracieid can not transmit.
   if I do not modify the request header,the tracieid can  transmit.
   how can I resolve it?
author: csullh

comments.body:
Please check the header, there is a key named `sw6` in it. If you filter works in sync mode, that is the only thing you should do. You mentioned about modify header, so, somehow, skywalking header is not injected or overrided by your OP. 

@zhaoyuguang could you follow up? I wouldn't wait this for 6.4.0, so tagged as 6.5.0

title: Could we add more metric tags for separating them by service, endpoint or instance?
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- Right now, metrics as blow:
metrics_aggregation{sw_backend_instance="standalone",metricName="all_heatmap",level="2",dimensionality="month",} 3.0
metrics_aggregation{sw_backend_instance="standalone",metricName="service_instance_cpm",level="1",dimensionality="min",} 7.0
metrics_aggregation{sw_backend_instance="standalone",metricName="database_access_p99",level="2",dimensionality="hour",} 12.0
metrics_aggregation{sw_backend_instance="standalone",metricName="endpoint_sla",level="1",dimensionality="min",} 7.0
metrics_aggregation{sw_backend_instance="standalone",metricName="service_resp_time",level="2",dimensionality="hour",} 3.0

- Could we add more metric tags for separating them by service, endpoint or instance? ex:
metrics_aggregation{sw_backend_instance="standalone",metricName="service_instance_cpm",level="1",dimensionality="min",service="book-svc",} 7.0
author: stone-wlg

comments.body: Why do you want this? Self telemetry is about checking the health and payload, rather than exporting. There is an exporter module, if you want, implement that to Prometheus.
If you want, we could discuss about the contribution plan for that exporter, but don't use telemetry for this.

title: CompletableFuture.supplyAsync
body: Does version 6.3.0 not support CompletableFuture.supplyAsync?
author: SevenBlue2018

comments.body:
> CompletableFuture.supplyAsync

## Short answer is NO.

## Long version:

`CompletableFuture` is a JDK class, for now, the only one supported JDK class is `HttpURLConnection`, see #3171

author: xsisno1

comments.body: But agent doesn't need to.

Now we have a problem here, that is, multiple dubbo services are connected to agent. One dubbo service relies on other dubbo services. When tracking the link, it is found that collector cannot connect multiple dubbo services connected to agent.

> But agent doesn't need to.
Now we have a problem here, that is, multiple dubbo services are connected to agent. One dubbo service relies on other dubbo services. When tracking the link, it is found that collector cannot connect multiple dubbo services connected to agent.
I am not following your meaning. This API is even not designed for java agent side.
@xsisno1 If you are keeping talking in Chinese, I will stop to reply. It is on Apache repo and issue, we should use English.

> @xsisno1 If you are keeping talking in Chinese, I will stop to reply. It is on Apache repo and issue, we should use English.

We now have a problem with two dubbo services, one of which calls the other dubbo service, and we see in skywalking-ui that both dubbo services are registered with collectors, but on the topology diagram we see that the two dubbo services do not generate a calling relationship, and new nodes are created in the call chain. So you can't really do full link monitoring.
I don't remember we change Dubbo plugin, you should verify, whether there is header propagate across dubbo rpc? You could use remote debug to find out.

> I don't remember we change Dubbo plugin, you should verify, whether there is header propagate across dubbo rpc? You could use remote debug to find out.

The problem has been solved. It is our configuration problem. Thank you for your help

comments.body: Could you debug by yourself? There is no error in our side. Check your JDK is 8. And debug the codes.
I change mysql-connector-java to 5.1.44 table be  created .
Then I think it depends on MySQL driver implementation. We are using it to check whether the table exists. Should work from my understanding.

title: Why is the shard of the register_lock index single-sliced
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
Why is the shard of the register_lock index single-sliced.
___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?

- Which company or project?

- What happen?
If possible, provide a way for reproducing the error. e.g. demo application, component version.
Es a node down register_lock is not available
___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: HackerRookie

comments.body: We are using it as an unique seq creator. Not for metadata storage. Distributed lock is bad for performance.

> We are using it as an unique seq creator. Not for metadata storage. Distributed lock is bad for performance.

@wu-sheng The availability of skywalking will be reduced because of this. Is it necessary to solve this problem in 6.4.0 milestone?

Whether the es consistency feature can be satisfied。
Zk or redis to implement distributed lock instead
No plan to do this, yet. Zk is low performance too.
You could do anything you want. We haven't plan to do that. Adding another component is not good for end user. It is not that necessary.

> You could do anything you want. We haven't plan to do that. Adding another component is not good for end user. It is not that necessary.

tks

title: The skywalking oap server  cpu is too high to reach 100%
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x ] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
skywalking oapServer CPU is in 100% by standalone mode.I am adding 20 service monitors,
What do I need to do to get the CPU usage down?
___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
 CentOS7.3
- Which company or project?

- What happen?
If possible, provide a way for reproducing the error. e.g. demo application, component version.

___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: liyongfa0311

comments.body: How many CPUs? Which storage? How many agent instances?
4 core cpu，all reach 100%,8g ,abount 40 agent instances,I used jstack to find that there are a lot of threads waiting in the state.
SkyWalking version? I am wondering the storage, do you use Elasticsearch cluster?
the skywalking that I used is 6.2.0 and I use Es cluster,, the machine of es is 16c32g

Try 6.3.0, it will reduce some payload to OAP. But to be honest, 4c simple node OAP for 40 node agents, looks like not powerful enough. SkyWalking does aggregations inside OAP by using internal stream computing core, it is not a simple collector to receive and save.

Also, check your ES status, and our recommendations about ES bulk settings.

title: can we filter by namespace(setting in agent.config) in skywalking UI?
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [×] Question or discussion

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
can we filter by namespace(setting in agent.config) in skywalking UI?
for example:
	in topology page, if we choose "dubbo-app-1", then only components(consumers/providers...) in "dubbo-app-1" will show in topology.

if not, what's the usage of this "namespace" setting?
author: makingtime

comments.body: No. Namespace is for isolation, not tenancy.

sudo docker run -e TZ="Asia/Shanghai"  --name apche-oap-node1 --restart always -d -p 12800:12800 -p 11800:11800 -e SW_STORAGE=elasticsearch -e SW_STORAGE_ES_CLUSTER_NODES=ip:port,ip:port,ip:port -e SW_NAMESPACE=skywalking -e SW_STORAGE_ES_BULK_ACTIONS=2000 -e SW_STORAGE_ES_BULK_SIZE=20 -e SW_STORAGE_ES_FLUSH_INTERVAL=10 -e SW_STORAGE_ES_CONCURRENT_REQUESTS=2 -e SW_STORAGE_ES_QUERY_MAX_SIZE=5000 -e SW_STORAGE_ES_QUERY_SEGMENT_SIZE=200 -e SW_CLUSTER=nacos -e SW_SERVICE_NAME=SkyWalking_OAP_Cluster -e SW_CLUSTER_NACOS_HOST_PORT=ip:port,ip:port,ip:port apache/skywalking-oap-server

title: Elasticsearch index was not created for each day
body:
The issue we have encountred is we cannot see any trace logs after 2019-08-04 23:59:59, and I checked the elasticsearch index segment, but I can only see the name segment-20190804 there.  I also checked the creation time of segment-20190804, it was created in 2019-08-04 00:02. Whether we expected to see the segment-20190805 or not? 

BTW, we are using the latest version 6.2.0.
author: yijiuping

comments.body: How long have you used the 6.2.0? How many days? Check other indexes, such as service_p99.

>  How long have you used the 6.2.0? How many days? Check other indexes, such as service_p99.

Thanks for your quick response!! We upgraded our deployment from 6.1.0 to 6.2.0 in July, acutually, we just using it for two weeks, and not always can get the trace logs. I want to find out the reason and fix it.  As your guidence, I checked the indices in ES, I can see blow list: service_p99-20190804
service_p99_hour-20190804
service_p99_month-201907
service_p99_day-20190804

The ES version is 6.3.2.

First, if upgrade happens, have you removed all elasticsearch indexes? Auto created based on elasticsearch template. From you posted, the indexes can't be created, the existing is created by bootstrap.

So make sure your elasticsearch index have been removed.

> First, if upgrade happens, have you removed all elasticsearch indexes? Auto created based on elasticsearch template. From you posted, the indexes can't be created, the existing is created by bootstrap.
> 
> So make sure your elasticsearch index have been removed.

We reinstalled ES, SkyWalking OAP and SkyWalking Agent from stratch, the indexes were auto created by SkyWalking 6.2.0.  Do you mean it's not the standard way? We did the compatibility testing based on SkyWalking 6.2.0 and SkyWalking 6.1.0 indexes, and its not works, so we reinstalled everything.

Re-install could trigger index creation, yes. But after the first day, the index creation is based on ElasticSearch template, which we created too, by using the old index name, such as `service_p99`. Check your ElasticSearch template setting, to see whether it is there.

> Re-install could trigger index creation, yes. But after the first day, the index creation is based on ElasticSearch template, which we created too, by using the old index name, such as `service_p99`. Check your ElasticSearch template setting, to see whether it is there.

Thanks for your guidence! We missed the templates creation step! I cannot find the guide about this step, can you provide us an URL?
Template created through codes when OAP start up. If you can't find it in ES, I think maybe you have the old indexes which are sharing the same names.

> Template created through codes when OAP start up. If you can't find it in ES, I think maybe you have the old indexes which are sharing the same names.

I just checked the ES templates, they are all created by default. :)

Then the index should be created when data flows in. It is created based on your metrics/segments etc. If you can't create, maybe something forbids you, I heard (but not be sure), some ElasticSearch service(such as in AliCloud), they have options to disable this auto index creation.

> Then the index should be created when data flows in. It is created based on your metrics/segments etc. If you can't create, maybe something forbids you, I heard (but not be sure), some ElasticSearch service(such as in AliCloud), they have options to disable this auto index creation.

:( We are using AliCloud. I will confirm it. Thank you very much!!!

title: apm-agent-core PluginDefine(skywalking-plugin.def) support String argument: add a feature for reuse some ClassEnhancePluginDefine
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting pull request

- Why submit this pull request?
- [ ] Bug fix
- [x] New feature provided
- [ ] Improve performance

- Related issues

___
### Bug fix
- Bug description.

- How to fix?

___
### New feature or improvement
- Describe the details and related test reports.

apm-agent-core PluginDefine(skywalking-plugin.def) support String argument: add a feature for reuse some ClassEnhancePluginDefine, which cloud reduce duplicate code of plugins

such as EnhancedInstanceInstrumentation:
```
vertx-core-3.x.enhancedInstanceClasses=io.vertx.core.impl.EventLoopContext;io.vertx.core.impl.WorkerContext
```
or
```
okhttp-3.x.enhancedInstanceClasses=okhttp3:Request,Response
```
or
```
okhttp-3.x=org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.plugin.interceptor.enhance.EnhancedInstanceInstrumentation:okhttp3:Request,Response
```
@apache/skywalking-committers
author: qxo

comments.body: I am not following. I need more clear use case.

We have intercept point definitions already. Why do you want to change API?

I noticed you submitted many pull requests, which are all pointing to change APIs. They don't make sense to me. All these things, could be done by current API easily.

You need to understand open source community API basic principles
1. Have clear usage, and as easy as possible.
1. Once it is set, don't change it unless have too.
1. Performance is just perspective, not has to be best. 
1. Changing API is mostly accepted when you are core maintainer,whcih means you could support the project in the future, because every new API means payload to core maintainer team. If everyone could add one, and leave, the core team is impossible to maintainer. So all changes must be in deeply discussion, not just for anyone's convenience.
1. Coding style is not the reason to change APIs. Feature and use case are.

I agree these principles
But the change of the API is for the future ...

The goal of this pr try to improve code reuse -- 增加代码重用度，减少插件中的重复代码
skywalking-plugin.def如支持通过定义传入构建器参数，则只用少数几个通用的AbstractClassEnhancePluginDefine子类，然后各插件可通过声明式定义来实现相同功能，重用代码逻辑:)

Also, in many open source projects, including SkyWalking. We don't do design for the future, unless it is a real scenario which we can't support.

I rejected the changes because I don't see the necessary of new APIs. Intercept point APIs are lower the maintain payload when plugin core refactor. DI is better than hierarchy always. Also, how could you support hierarchy enhance? By interface or super class?

Open source APIs need to be consistent abd clear. Your design looks like for internal developers, try to make it easy.

title: Why the plugin do not generate a traceid
author: thisisgpy

comments.body: You can make a breakpoint in the log, look at the java stack pin, or pr?

I hava solve it. This is because I changed the location of the logback-toolkit.

This plugin is use to trace xxl-job，and now，I can not intercept its IJobHandler，because the method execute() is abstractively。It means, if I change enhance class to IJobHandler in this plugin，it dose not work.Could you tell me how to do for thus abstract method ?
You can't instrument abstract, because it is impossible. But you could instrument all classes implement that interface, who has declared this method.

comments.body: Which load balance?

> 
> 
> Which load balance?

I want to do the load balance for backend server by agent client. if backend server is cluster mode by zookeeper,i can get backend server address by zookeeper at agent client side.do you think?

You can't guarantee which coordinator used at server side, and it is unwise to put so many clients at agents. There are plenty of load balance there, nginx, envoy, kong etc.

Also, in many production env, agents and OAP backends are deployed in different zones or VPCs, zookeeper style load balance is not working.

> 
> 
> You can't guarantee which coordinator used at server side, and it is unwise to put so many clients at agents. There are plenty of load balance there, nginx, envoy, kong etc.
> 
 if i use nginx for oap load balance,but how do the load balance for nginx when nginx is large load?

> if i use nginx for oap load balance,but how do the load balance for nginx when nginx is large load?

How do you do for a Gateway? It is the same scenario.

> 
> 
> > if i use nginx for oap load balance,but how do the load balance for nginx when nginx is large load?
> 
> How do you do for a Gateway? It is the same scenario.

by the DNS
It is same always

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion

- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question

### Bug

- Which company or project?

- What happen?
If possible, provide a way for reproducing the error. e.g. demo application, component version.

### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.

title: After the SamplingService is running at the agent, how to ensure the integrity of trace?
body:
After the SamplingService is running at the agent, how to ensure the integrity of trace?
Before a entrySpan created, it will be judged that whether the request has a header whose key is "sw6" or "sw3". If the answer is yes, the entrySpan will be forced to sample. However, exitSpans will never be forced to sample. 
According to my understanding, it is only be ensured that the tracing information need to be receiced after been sended across the request header.
author: pmq5205209

comments.body: Sample is context based. No span based. You misunderstand.

title: About oap starter assert.
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [] Feature or performance improvement

___

In the code ModuleManager, method assertPreparedStage called by manager.find(). I think find executed behind init method, also they run in the same thread as main thread. is this must assert ?
author: wayilau

comments.body: Yes, because `#find` should only happen after init stage. **Init** should not count on the dependencies.

title: 远程加载agent jar

- [ 远程加载 agent的jar包] Requirement
### Requirement or improvement
期望 agent lib包单独放在一个地方维护。加载的时候可以通过网络的方式加载此jar包。
这样如果扩展包有bug可以直接放在一个地方加载即可。简化重复部署的可能性。
author: toread

comments.body: English only. And the thing you asking is violating the Apache rules. We do not belong a vendor, this is a community.

title: parentSegmentId question
body: a request pass 3 node , first node use java agent ,second node use nodejs agent， third node use java agent。but on trace page the chart is incomplete。I found the nodejs agent sent span data have a problem that the parentSegmentId in refs  equal trace_id , I think parentSegmentId should be the first node sent segmentId , but it's not ,why?
author: zou79189747

comments.body: Ask this at nodejs agent project. It isn't skywalking issue.

Header has two versions protocol. I don't know whether it upgraded in nodejs agent. SkyWalking java agent has compatible mode with v5 header.

Read setup document.

In Java agent the config agent.active_v2_header default is true , I want to check SkyAPM-nodejs config ,but 
 so many page url return 404 in SkyAPM-nodejs document ,I can't find the config list  ,I create a new issue in nodejs agent project , but that project looks like inactive，I'm not sure  I will get answer. And can you show me the url about v5 header
In java agent, v5 header is `agent.active_v1_header`. cc @ascrutae

comments.body:
Normal on windows
---------------
Linux will not work

title: Why networkAddress insert ServiceInventory and ServiceInstanceInventory?
body: The networkAddress is registered on network_address_inventory, and is it registered on ServiceInventory and ServiceInstanceInventory? Service is registered on ServiceInventory, ServiceInstance is registered on ServiceInstanceInventory, if networkAddress is only registered on network_address_inventory , it's nice to manager.

title: Some questions about timeseries
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?

1. I notice that TimeSeries will create more serveral times indexes in ES-storage-plugin. I my learned, too many indexes is very expensive, especily in small ES cluster.

2. Downsampling.Hour means sampling one point very hour. That is Downsampling.Hour will sample less data than Downsampling.Second, right? If true, why does Downsampling.Hour need to be split into more slices(indexes)?
author: dmsolr

comments.body:
1. Elasticsearch storage is never designed for small scale case. We change it for improving stability, which if you used the 6.1.0 or before in high payload is very obvious.
1. Downstream is just about dataset size, but it has same write and read frequency. 

The key of this change is delete impact, which will make elasticsearch crash easier than more indexes. Also, feel free to disable month level downstream, I personally don't think it is necessary, it is there just for keep UI and functions consistently and perfectly for new users
thanks for your comment.

title: is it Ok for alarm structure in cluster mode
author: Justice-love

comments.body: Why do you think there is issue in cluster mode? How does alarm cause conflicts with cluster? I am not following.

> Why do you think there is issue in cluster mode? How does alarm cause conflicts with cluster? I am not following.

in cluster mode, every service instance may  check the alarm rule and  callback send the alarm message.
such as i want to receive one alarm message in 2 minutes but i receive two same messages actually
I don't think you could receive two same messages. It could be alarming for different entities. I think you have understood the data flow.
this class? `AlarmStandardPersistence`
Read how we do distributed aggregration. Don't guess what we are doing.
Thanks, I will learn it.

title: when oapService and UI restart,the UI do not display the agent services
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?

I deployed skywalking6.2.0(official releases) ,storage is elasticsearch ,the UI Dashboard has more then 10 agent services.

when  restart oapService and webappService(UI service)  ,do not restart agent services.
the UI Dashboard has nothings

the agent status is CONNECTED 
agent logs ： 
DEBUG 2019-07-04 09:35:48:879 SkywalkingAgent-4-ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient-0 ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient :  ServiceAndEndpointRegisterClient running, status:CONNECTED. 
DEBUG 2019-07-04 09:35:50:543 DataCarrier.DEFAULT.Consumser.0.Thread TraceSegmentServiceClient :  11 trace segments have been sent to collector. 

___
after  restart the agent service ,the UI Dashboard has data again
___
### Requirement or improvement
-When restart oapService and webappService(UI service) , How to avoid restart agent service?
author: shinelon

comments.body: This log seems normal. But which storage are you using? Since you are talking about a reboot, the OAP runs in H2 storage default, which is an in-memory DB. The metadata lost, and no data will show unless you reboot the agent. Also, in this case, should be able to see many NPE(s) in OAP logs.
I deployed skywalking6.2.0(official releases) ,storage is elasticsearch
Then reboot is irrelevant. We reboot our service routinely, nothing happens. Please pay attention to your ElasticSearch status.

title: is is possible stop and start skywalking without restarting application server
body: is it possible stop and start skywalking without restarting application server
author: zheyiyi

comments.body: You don't need to do that. Why are you asking this?
I just thought that if i don't want to collect trace and I don't need to stop application server and remove skywalking

> You don't need to do that. Why are you asking this?

I just thought that if i don't want to collect trace and I don't need to stop application server and remove skywalking
The agent change application codes automatically. So, you can't make it undo at the runtime.

title: why OAPServerStartUp will be killed multiple times？
body:
ps -ef | grep "org.apache.skywalking.oap.server.starter.OAPServerStartUp" | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9

I will kill multiple times but the process start go on， how  to kill this processing?
author: ljh205sy

comments.body:
I think that you just shut down the oap-server because `startup.sh` starts two processes(oapService.sh+webappService.sh), so you can try it:
`ps -ef | grep "skywalking-webapp.jar" | grep -v grep | awk '{print $2}'| xargs kill -9`

title: HTTP/2 client preface string missing or corrupt
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ ] Question or discussion
-  Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement


___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
master, centos7, OpenJDK(build 1.8.0_131-b12)
- Which company or project?
oapServer
- What happen?
i see the error from log of oap.log
Jun 26, 2019 6:43:27 PM io.grpc.netty.NettyServerTransport notifyTerminated
INFO: Transport failed
io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2Exception: HTTP/2 client preface string missing or corrupt. Hex dump for received bytes: 0000002c0000000000000000000000000000753000000000
        at io.netty.handler.codec.http2.Http2Exception.connectionError(Http2Exception.java:85)

### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: coki230

comments.body: Please search at grpc java project.

Hi Wu-sheng,

I am currently doing a POC to adopt Skywalking in a major project. Along the setup, I;ve faced couple of roadblock due to the documentation. 

This reported issue is one of them, even when I went to check Java grpc, it was of no help.

I understand the goal of Skywalking is to appeal to a more international audience, but the way i see the reported issue being close, that is not at all helpful, and certainly would not appeal to international companies in adopting Skywalking.

I hope to seek your understanding in the importance of community support for the project.

Thanks.

comments.body: If you have verified there is data in storage, read the first line of setup document, make sure your time and time zone of agent and OAP are as same as your browser. Or set browser UTC time(in UI) to match those.

**Agent Config**

```
agent.service_name=myappname
agent.ignore_suffix=${SW_AGENT_IGNORE_SUFFIX:.jpg,.jpeg,.js,.css,.png,.bmp,.gif,.ico,.mp3,.mp4,.html,.svg}
collector.backend_service=skywalking-collector:11800
logging.level=INFO
```
author: gamefundas

comments.body: From the shadow dump log, the trace never finished, maybe plugin incompatible or bug, I can't be sure from logs.
If you could provide a demo to reproduce the issue(shadow dump), maybe we could find.

This seems to suggest that there is a limit on the no of spans Skywalking can create, 300 I guess. Is there a way to increase this limit?


> 2019-06-24 12:19:05:347 main TracingContext : More than 300 spans required to create java.lang.RuntimeException: Shadow tracing context. Thread dump at org.apache.skywalking.apm.agent.core.context.TracingContext.isLimitMechanismWorking(TracingContext.java:539) at
Do you really have over 300+ spans in a trace segment? If yes, you could open it in agent.config. The agent setup document shows the all options.

It’s weird I shouldn’t have that many spans. I see that the dashboard shows the count of services, database etc but graphs don’t show any information. 

Will increase the span limit to see if I spot anything.

@gamefundas  i am new for apache skywalking. I have downloaded skywalking 6.1.0 and setup on linux machine. Same linux machine i used to setup backend and UI. On same VM my java application docker conatiner is running in which i have configured the skywalk agent. Once i open the UI in that not able to see any service or application or anything. Please suggest me or let me know how to configure agent.

> It’s weird I shouldn’t have that many spans. I see that the dashboard shows the count of services, database etc but graphs don’t show any information.

That is my guess, there is one or several incompatible plugins you are using, so trace would be finished and reported. I would suggest you to use one plugin a time, from Tomcat or SpringMVC, to see what happens.
And in SkyWalking, plugin remote debug skill is important. Plugins are tested many times, but with a huge number of versions, it still bases on your use scenarios.
@jatin85 If you are new, want to discuss 101, slack is a better place. For container, most users forget to choose UTC0(container default tz) in UI.
Thanks @wu-sheng . Please share slack channel.

title: Log4j2 Aysnc Log Support. No trace Id when using async of Log4j2
author: evanxuhe

comments.body: We don't support that, yet. Look the open PR, some similar one there.
You need to deal with across thread propagation for traceid

title: Can skywalking integrate with logstash or kafka?
body:
### Question
- now the skywalking's data is stored in es,but we think  it's too slow to export data to hive,so could you please tell me if sw can integrate with logstash or kafka?thta's may be faster.
and if the answer is 'yes',is there any demo?or just give me some train of thought,thanks a lot
author: tianma0314

comments.body: What kinds of data do you want to export? Is ElasticSearch still being used for SkyWalking UI?
i think mq is unfriendly for ad-hoc query.

> What kinds of data do you want to export? 
some field name as follows:
traceId
segmentId
spanId
parentSpanId
refs
serviceCode
startTime
endTime
endpointName
type
peer
component...and so on

>Is ElasticSearch still being used for SkyWalking UI?
I know that es perfomes the role as the metastore of SW, so...maybe it's used for UI,not sure,I am fresh ,sorry for that...

> i think mq is unfriendly for ad-hoc query.

we are building a data warehouse on hive, we need some data from skywalking,but I tried es-hive integration,it was too slow,so I am looking for some other ways like kafka or logstash->kafka

Then this is not going to work easily. Hive can't and shouldn't be considered as SkyWalking storage. If you understand SkyWalking aggregates models, you should know why.

From your reply, you are treating SkyWalking ad simple tracing system, it isn't. Read our development document of storage extension, we highlight the required features of storage.

title: [BUG] Can not locate agent jar file
body:
when i use grpc register service find a problem，in my project add pom
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.apache.skywalking</groupId>
    <artifactId>apm-agent-core</artifactId>
    <version>6.1.0</version>
</dependency>
and apm-agent-core.jar in WEB-INF/lib/
use main func run GRPCChannelManager connect success
but build my project as war in tomcat run connect fair  
error:Can not locate agent jar file
i found AgentPackagePath.findPath use ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader.getResource get URL
in my project return null so get error:Can not locate agent jar file
i change this code to 
URL resource = ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader().getResource(classResourcePath); 
if (resource == null) {
   resource = AgentPackagePath.class.getClassLoader().getResource(classResourcePath); 
}
in tomcat run connect success
but i am not sure this way is the best  can your give me some suggest
author: zou79189747

comments.body: Don't put agent.jar or any other SkyWalking plugin jars in your classpath. SkyWalking loads them automatically.

我这边的场景是全链路分析，有C写的网关，有java写的微服务，java微服务那快没什么问题直接-javaagent就可以了，但是C这边我们的方案是 通过一个掉用一个java后台提过的http接口来注册服务， 该接口调用skywalking grpc 来注册服务，提过java接口的后台是一个web工程，且在tomcat catalin.bat里面没有使用-javaagent ，这个场景下我就引用了apm-agent-core这个依赖，调用doServiceRegister注册服务，然后在tomcat环境下 报Can not locate agent jar file这个错，调试发现URL resource = ClassLoader.getSystemClassLoader().getResource(classResourcePath); resource为null ,想请问一下这个场景我修改源码有问题吗，还是有其他更好的方式解决
English only. I have said what is the issue. `-javaagent` is also needed in Tomcat, and don't put agent in Tomcat lib or your application lib, a.k.a. not in any classpath of JVM.
thanks ! as you said do , it is ok now.  but this way i have to use skywalking in my web project , this data is not needed

> thanks ! as you said do , it is ok now. but this way i have to use skywalking in my web project , this data is not needed

What do you mean `data is not needed`? Confusing.

I don't need use skywalking to monitor the web project , if add -javaagent in tomcat  , it will send my web project monitor data to ES , like Service 、ServiceInstance 、segment , this datas is no use to me.
I am totally lost. If you don't need, why add SkyWalking there? Why ask a question in SkyWalking community?

I use SkyWalking in other Microservices ，In this web project just provide restful Interface to Third party，help them  register service 、serviceInstance  and send trace segment to skywalking storage ，this web project it's not must be monitor

The same question, if you don't need it, just don't attach the agent to JVM.

Are you asking severl web apps in one Tomcat container? Some are monitoring targets, others are not? I am just guessing because you don't give me a very clear context.

title: To make the BufferStratrgy configurable
body:

author: tzy1316106836

comments.body: What strategy do you want? It is binding the implementation.

Before sending the data, the segment data was saved in the buffer. The buffer supports several strategy when buffer is full, such as BLOCKING,OVERRIDE,IF_POSSIBLE, and the Default is BLOCKING. When I make a jar package, the BufferStragy can not modify, this can not meet all requirements. So I want to make it configurable.

That is meaningless. And for agent, the default is not blocking. Please read the codes. 
We have chosen the most reasonable one. Why need config to make unexpected result?

title: if setup ttl both core:default and storage:elasticsearch on application.yml then which one will effective
body:
application.yml

core:
  default:
    .....
    # Set a timeout on metric data. After the timeout has expired, the metric data will automatically be deleted.
    recordDataTTL: ${SW_CORE_RECORD_DATA_TTL:90} # Unit is minute
    minuteMetricsDataTTL: ${SW_CORE_MINUTE_METRIC_DATA_TTL:90} # Unit is minute
    hourMetricsDataTTL: ${SW_CORE_HOUR_METRIC_DATA_TTL:36} # Unit is hour
    dayMetricsDataTTL: ${SW_CORE_DAY_METRIC_DATA_TTL:45} # Unit is day
    monthMetricsDataTTL: ${SW_CORE_MONTH_METRIC_DATA_TTL:18} # Unit is month
storage:
  elasticsearch:
    ......
    # Those data TTL settings will override the same settings in core module.
    recordDataTTL: ${SW_STORAGE_ES_RECORD_DATA_TTL:7} # Unit is day
    otherMetricsDataTTL: ${SW_STORAGE_ES_OTHER_METRIC_DATA_TTL:45} # Unit is day
    monthMetricsDataTTL: ${SW_STORAGE_ES_MONTH_METRIC_DATA_TTL:18} # Unit is month

Are you using master? Are you familiar with SkyWalking? Master is a dev branch.
We have described this in ttl document. Please read
Elasticsearch ttl works. Again, make sure you understand whay skywalking is doing if you try master branch.

title: Deploy multiple war packages in a tomcat, start them, and there will be different application instances. How to distinguish the collected data from different applications?

- Which company or project?

- What happen?
If possible, provide a way for reproducing the error. e.g. demo application, component version.

___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: cyloer

comments.body:
Read our first line of the project introduction.
> SkyWalking: an APM(application performance monitor) system, especially designed for microservices, cloud native and container-based (Docker, Kubernetes, Mesos) architectures.

In micros-service, container-based, no one uses this deployment solution. So in default, we don't support this. We treat one OS process as one service instance only.
You could change source codes to do, but for use, I think it doesn't fit the goals.

title: TraceId is N/A in Logback AsyncAppender with TraceIdMDCPatternLogbackLayout
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [x] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
When I try to print TraceId in log with `apm-toolkit-logback-1.x` by #1241 #567 demo,
 I find it worked will with `ConsoleAppender`, but always print `N/A`  with  `AsyncAppender` .
```
<!-- logbak.xml -->
<configuration scan="true" scanPeriod=" 5 seconds">
    <appender name="STDOUT" class="ch.qos.logback.core.ConsoleAppender">
        <encoder class="ch.qos.logback.core.encoder.LayoutWrappingEncoder">
            <layout class="org.apache.skywalking.apm.toolkit.log.logback.v1.x.mdc.TraceIdMDCPatternLogbackLayout">
                <pattern>%d{yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS} [%X{tid}] [%thread] %-5level %logger{56} --- %msg%n</pattern>
            </layout>
        </encoder>
    </appender>

    <appender name="ASYNC_PRINT" class="ch.qos.logback.classic.AsyncAppender">
        <discardingThreshold>0</discardingThreshold>
        <queueSize>1024</queueSize>
        <neverBlock>true</neverBlock>
        <appender-ref ref="STDOUT"/>
    </appender>

    <root level="DEBUG">
        <!-- [TID:N/A] -->
        <appender-ref ref="ASYNC_PRINT"/>

        <!-- [TID:25.118.15585145542260003] -->
        <appender-ref ref="STDOUT"/>
    </root>
</configuration>
```
___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
SkyWalking version "6.1"
java version "1.8.0_161"
OS version  "Widows 10"

- Which company or project?
Spring Boot 2.1.X project 

- What happen?
`N/A`  instead of TraceID in log.
And I don't know if need other setting or coding or it's a bug.

comments.body: Because you need to agent toolkit activation to support. We don't support async append, you need to build a new activation to do that

title: Ignore AntPathMatcher Matching does not meet expectations
author: hlg212

comments.body:
We can't use Spring AntPathMatcher, because we can't deliver plugin depend on Spring. You could improve the path matcher in SkyWalking. 

But I prefer you don't copy from Spring, which doesn't fit the license requirement very well. If you do, we need to add things in NOTICE file.

title: framework.CglibAopProxy Final method [final object class.method$original$CbmCW8iL$accessor$xb4ioB8n(java.lang.String)] cannot get proxied via CGLIB: Calls to this method will NOT be routed to the target instance and might lead to NPEs against uninitialized fields in the proxy instance.
body:
In the agent project log info, I found an occasional log
```
2019-05-15 17:00:30,648 INFO  framework.CglibAopProxy Final method [final com.*.*.response.BaseResponse com.*.*.controller.AdvertController.detailProjectTag$original$CbmCW8iL$accessor$xb4ioB8n(java.lang.String)] cannot get proxied via CGLIB: Calls to this method will NOT be routed to the target instance and might lead to NPEs against uninitialized fields in the proxy instance.
2019-05-15 17:00:30,648 INFO  framework.CglibAopProxy Final method [final com.*.*.response.BaseResponse com.*.*.controller.AdvertController.listAdvert$original$CbmCW8iL$accessor$xb4ioB8n(int,int)] cannot get proxied via CGLIB: Calls to this method will NOT be routed to the target instance and might lead to NPEs against uninitialized fields in the proxy instance.
2019-05-15 17:00:30,648 INFO  framework.CglibAopProxy Final method [final com.*.*.response.BaseResponse com.*.*.controller.AdvertController.deleteBanner$original$CbmCW8iL$accessor$xb4ioB8n(java.lang.String)] cannot get proxied via CGLIB: Calls to this method will NOT be routed to the target instance and might lead to NPEs against uninitialized fields in the proxy instance.
2019-05-15 17:00:30,648 INFO  framework.CglibAopProxy Final method [final com.*.*.response.BaseResponse com.*.*.controller.AdvertController.listTwoBanner$original$CbmCW8iL$accessor$xb4ioB8n(int,int,java.lang.String)] cannot get proxied via CGLIB: Calls to this method will NOT be routed to the target instance and might lead to NPEs against uninitialized fields in the proxy instance.
```

My project is use spring mvc, and proxy also is cglib. This is just a general project，like most other project. Because it is an occasional situation, i cannot provide the necessary code.
just the spring.xml proxy config is:
```
<aop:aspectj-autoproxy proxy-target-class="true" />
```

So I guess probably because of the cglib proxy class order. When agent project use cglib and the skywalking agent is use cglib too, but the cglib proxy will add a final attribute in front of the method, when both of them are proxy at the same time,this problem occurs.

The skywalking version is 6.1.0
author: cc-chen

comments.body:
Cglib is common, SkyWalking instruments a lot of projects use that.  There are two things
1. SkyWalking don't use proxy mechanism, so not at the same time. Agent changes codes when classes loaded in Clasa Loader.
2. SkyWalking doesn't care about final method or attribute, because we change class file in memory.

Under what circumstances will this log be printed?
This will not happen until skywalking is used.

i got the reason.
Because aspectj(on spring aop) used in project.
The method in the controller generated by bytebuddy has been delegated many times.

> The method in the controller generated by bytebuddy has been delegated many times.

I meet the same question with you. but I can't use the aspectj.....

> delegated many times.

The duplicated delegation could be caused by another agent or another byte-code-level tech. If the class name would not be changed, you could activate `IS_CACHE_ENHANCED_CLASS` in the agent side.

- Why do you submit this issue?

### Question
[Summary]
Is it possible to merge multiple requests with different @PathVariable into same EndPoint?

[Detail]
There are some requests which share a part of common path. These requests are only different in the last URL parameter.
eg.
/app/method/1001
/app/method/1002
/app/method/1003
my target:
I wonder if they can all be logged in endpoint /app/method.

comments.body: We have supported this in SpringMVC plugin, if you set the annotation as `/app/method/{id}` in spring annotation.
We also meet this problem like  @galaxyyao

title: 6.1.0 webapp add context-path for proxy fail
body:
hello , I want to add context-path for webapp, then i can use nginx to proxy it. Unfortunately, it fail.
I modify the webapp/webapp.yml as follow.

server:
  port: 8080
  context-path: /skywalking
author: JustUse

comments.body: Js codes can't access your new context. Change codes id you want.

> Js codes can't access your new context. Change codes id you want.

Is there no some solutions now?
We don't have plan to provide such feature. Not relate to project goals.

won't it create issues if I want to push my frontend application being served at port 80 but skywalking is running at 8080. The browser will start throwing CORS issue. I think it is a general use case. 
Currently all the UI loads directly from root context, an additional context configuration should be there. meanwhile this could be done by doing changes  in the code.
应该有个对策给这个场景。绝大多数公司都有安全限制。对外端口这种都是严格控制不是任意服务可以独享的。常规情况下，多服务都是经80匹配location转发到后端服务。这是很基础的需求。

comments.body:
> DEBUG 2019-05-09 09:17:48:103 DubboServerHandler-10.42.188.146:20883-thread-62 TraceSegmentServiceClient : One trace segment has been abandoned, cause by buffer is full.

This is not a failure. This is a debug log, showing you, backend performance may be not enough to support. So, agent abandons the trace, to avoid to crash your application. This is the key fail-safe mechanism in the agent.

> ERROR 2019-05-09 09:17:48:123 DubboServerHandler-10.42.188.146:20883-thread-62 InstMethodsInterWithOverrideArgs : class[class com.rabbitmq.client.impl.ChannelN] after method[basicPublish] intercept failure
java.lang.IllegalStateException: No active span.

This related to your rabbitmq plugin, maybe not compatible. You need to debug the plugin and find out why. Or provide demo codes to reproduce the error. THe demo codes should be easy for us to run at local.

title: 5 question in alarm module
body:
1、在RunningRule类的Window内部类中规则触发次数判断重复：在isMatch方法结尾处与checkAlarm方法中均做了触发次数的判断。
  建议去掉其中之一。
2、在AlarmCore类start方法的启动单例线程中先调用moveTo方法，后判断当前调用时间的秒数是否大于15进行告警规则的判定，会出现判定数据丢失的情况。
  建议将moveTo方法移到后面处理
3、在AlarmCore类start方法的启动单例线程中调用moveTo方法时，传入的checkTime未将秒数和毫秒数清零，导致moveTo方法中计算分钟数有误差。
   建议在调用moveTo方法时将秒数和毫秒数清零。
4、在AlarmCore类start方法的启动单例线程中set lastExecuteTime时间时只清零了秒数，未将毫秒数清零，导致在计算lastExecuteTime与执行时间checkTime分钟差时出现误差。
   建议set lastExecuteTime时间时将秒数和毫秒数均清零。
   
5、在AlarmCore类start方法的启动单例线程中只会在checkTime的秒数大于15秒后才会进行告警规则的判定，且之前有判断lastExecuteTime与checkTim分钟差大于0时，导致每分钟只会执行一次check规则触发判定。
   这个问题不好描述，举个例子说明如下：
    设定告警规则：2分钟内出现2次服务吞吐量大于10，静默时间为0 
          交易时间      交易秒数      交易量
         12:01           ---           12
         12:02           <15            9
         12:02           >15            2
         12:03           <15            10
         
         因启动的单例线程每10秒执行一次，则会在12:03分秒数小于15调用交易时会调用moveTo方法，将01分的数据清掉，所以在12:02和12:03分的判断中均没有触发规则。事实是12:01和12:02分已经触发上述规则了。
         
         建议可将RunningRule类的Window内部类的values属性长度增大一个，在checkAlarm时不判断当前分钟的数据，判断前period时间段数据。
author: zhl1987

comments.body: English only. Sorry. As you have detailed steps about how to fix, please submit several pull requests to fix each issue.
No update in one month.

title: What will makes CPM less than the real
body:
- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ ] Question or discussion

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?

I see that  the DataCarrier in TraceSegmentServiceClient uses BufferStrategy.IF_POSSIBLE, so some segment will lose if there is too many segments to send.   So is there other situations in which segment will lose?

If I  change the sampleRate from 1000 to 100, only payload of segment persisting will reduce to 10%, right?

How many CPM can one backend server load(Simply 8 cpu), and how can I compute how many backend servers should the cluster include?

Maybe I should just ask one each, sorry.
author: mbao

comments.body:
> I see that the DataCarrier in TraceSegmentServiceClient uses BufferStrategy.IF_POSSIBLE, so some segment will lose if there is too many segments to send. So is there other situations in which segment will lose?

No. 

> If I change the sampleRate from 1000 to 100, only payload of segment persisting will reduce to 10%, right?

If you are saying client sampling, yes. Also the metric values lose 90%.

> How many CPM can one backend server load(Simply 8 cpu), and how can I compute how many backend servers should the cluster include?

Depend on ElasticSearch performance. 8 CPU could reach 5k/s at least.
For 6.0.0-GA, it is designed for >~16Core. And 6.1 release(haven't yet) will be good work at different CPU cores.

> > I see that the DataCarrier in TraceSegmentServiceClient uses BufferStrategy.IF_POSSIBLE, so some segment will lose if there is too many segments to send. So is there other situations in which segment will lose?
> 
> No.
> 
> > If I change the sampleRate from 1000 to 100, only payload of segment persisting will reduce to 10%, right?
> 
> If you are saying client sampling, yes. Also the metric values lose 90%.

I mean sampleRate  for backend .  I think sample_n_per_3_secs is the only parameter for me to change the sample rate in agent client, right?
What do you mean by metric values? I think CPM value is still the exact value as sampleRate just impacts SegmentSpanListener for segment persistence. 
> 
> > How many CPM can one backend server load(Simply 8 cpu), and how can I compute how many backend servers should the cluster include?
> 
> Depend on ElasticSearch performance. 8 CPU could reach 5k/s at least.

What about mysql?  I think mysql is not optimized .

Thank you very much.

> I mean sampleRate for backend . I think sample_n_per_3_secs is the only parameter for me to change the sample rate in agent client, right?
What do you mean by metric values? I think CPM value is still the exact value as sampleRate just impacts SegmentSpanListener for segment persistence.

For server-side sampling, yes. Your description looks right.

> What about mysql? I think mysql is not optimized .

We are running over tens of millions segment per day, so elasticsearch is widely used by us. For MySQL, I have added some indexes. If you have any new suggestion, pull request is always welcome.

title: trace not work once the agent trace buffer was full
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion

once the agent meet the buffer limit and starting abandon segment like:

> TraceSegmentServiceClient :  One trace segment has been abandoned, cause by buffer is full. 

then all future data sent to oap is missing,even the log said it already send to oap:

>TraceSegmentServiceClient :  3748 trace segments have been sent to collector.

you cant find the data anywhere in the webui,all data submited , include trace, jvm metrics,,is gone,and this situation would last until the oap restarted
author: zhang98722

comments.body:
> once the agent meet the buffer limit and starting abandon segment like:

This is our design, it should work in this way, otherwise, you will be facing memory leak and crash at this moment. Nothing about your further descriptions

Your further descriptions are hard to diagnose from your simple words. You really need to dig more in oap.log, oap telemetry, elasticsearch log and elasticsearch monitoring. You will find clue there.

> > once the agent meet the buffer limit and starting abandon segment like:
> 
> This is our design, it should work in this way, otherwise, you will be facing memory leak and crash at this moment. Nothing about your further descriptions
> 
> Your further descriptions are hard to diagnose from your simple words. You really need to dig more in oap.log, oap telemetry, elasticsearch log and elasticsearch monitoring. You will find clue there.

i checked,oap,es log is all right,and data confirmed in es
but you cant get anything through webapp ui
If data is in ES, there should be never wrong. Query is very easy, you could simple debug by yourself. Focus on time bucket(including time zone) and service/instance/endpoint IDs.

what's the difference of TraceSegmentServiceHandler and TraceSegmentReportServiceHandler， JVMMetricsServiceHandler and JVMMetricReportServiceHandler?

2.配置文件 application.yml
#cluster:
# The Zookeeper cluster for collector cluster management.
#  zookeeper:
#    hostPort: 192.168.1.120:2181
#    sessionTimeout: 100000
naming:
# Host and port used for agent config
  jetty:  
    # 配置agent发现collector集群,host必须要系统真实网络ip地址. agent --(HTTP)--> collector
    host: localhost 
    port: 10800
    contextPath: /
remote:
  gRPC:
    # 配置collector节点在集群中相互通信,host必须要系统真实网络ip地址. collectorN --(gRPC) --> collectorM
    host: 0.0.0.0 
    port: 11800
agent_gRPC:
  gRPC:
    # 配置agent上传(链路跟踪和指标)数据到collector,host必须要系统真实网络ip地址. agent--(gRPC)--> collector
    host: 0.0.0.0 
    port: 11800
agent_jetty:
  jetty:  
    # 配置agent上传(链路跟踪和指标)数据到collector,host必须要系统真实网络ip地址. agent--(HTTP)--> collector
    # SkyWalking native Java/.Net/node.js agents don't use this.
    # Open this for other implementor.
    host: 0.0.0.0 
    port: 12800
    contextPath: /
analysis_register:
  default:
analysis_jvm:
  default:
analysis_segment_parser:
  default:
    bufferFilePath: ../buffer/
    bufferOffsetMaxFileSize: 10M
    bufferSegmentMaxFileSize: 500M
ui:
  jetty:  
    # 配置UI访问collector,host必须要系统真实网络ip地址. 
    host: 127.0.0.1
    port: 12800
    contextPath: /
# 配置Elasticsearch 集群连接信息
storage:
  elasticsearch:
    clusterName: CollectorDBCluster
    clusterTransportSniffer: true
    clusterNodes: 192.168.1.121:9300
    indexShardsNumber: 2
    indexReplicasNumber: 0
    highPerformanceMode: true
    # 设置统计指标数据的失效时间，当指标数据失效时系统将数据自动删除.

title: add apm-spring-annotation-plugin to dependency  not work when deploy in tomcat
body:
- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ ] Question or discussion


___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
In order to trace local spring span, I  can put apm-spring-annotation-plugin-6.0.0-GA.jar from optional-plugins to plugins. But I wonder if I can add apm-spring-annotation-plugin to  dependency for tracing spring bean?  It is OK when I test this by staring my springboot application with inner tomcat, but it fails when I start my application by puting it in wabapp of tomcat 。
I wonder if this is the result of classloader of tomcat? Or can you explain it, thanks.
author: mbao

comments.body: I think it should work in Tomcat. It has no difference with other plugins. They all should work in Tomcat. No classloader issue in default Tomcat.

> I think it should work in Tomcat. It has no difference with other plugins. They all should work in Tomcat. No classloader issue in default Tomcat.

You mean put  apm-spring-annotation-plugin-6.0.0-GA.jar in TOMCAT_PATH/webapps/APPLICATION/WEB-INF/lib  will work as put it in AGENT_PATH/plugins ?

> I think it should work in Tomcat. It has no difference with other plugins. They all should work in Tomcat. No classloader issue in default Tomcat.

Put  apm-spring-annotation-plugin-6.0.0-GA.jar to TOMCAT_PATH/bin works.
I think AgentClassLoader's parent is AppClassLoader, and it's class path is TOMCAT_PATH/bin.
Thanks for your reply.
In my mind, in AGENT_PATH/plugins should work too.

> In my mind, in AGENT_PATH/plugins should work too.

Yes

comments.body: This mean your collector doesn't start up right.

Quick startup is provided in document, only use H2 as storage.

title: Is there a way to avoid call chain separation when ActiveMQ use pull mode？
body:
- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
Is there a way to avoid call chain separation when ActiveMQ use pull mode？
author: LyricsYo

comments.body: Yes, you could. You need to use `@Trace` or another way to create a local span, scoping the MQ pull and other OP(s) as child spans.

title: Can skywalking ClassMatch support regex classname match?

`buildJunction` take charge for this. You need to look byte-buddy document to understand how to build it.

title: mysql  varchar(300) needed?
body:
### Question
- What do you want to know?

I want to use mysql for storage. I see that create table sql use "id VARCHAR(300)", and mysql characterset is utf8mb4, so 300 * 4 > 767 and mysql returns "Index column size too large. The maximum column size is 767 bytes."

I wonder if I can change 300 smaller?
author: mbao

comments.body: If you are using dynamic row size, I think we should be fine `varchar(300)`. Otherwise, may be a problem. The reason we choose 300 is, the endpoint may be long, which should be saved as id in endpoint_inventory table.

> If you are using dynamic row size, I think we should be fine `varchar(300)`. Otherwise, may be a problem. The reason we choose 300 is, the endpoint may be long, which should be saved as id in endpoint_inventory table.

get it, thanks.
"dynamic row size"  is set at creating table ,so I have to change the code or create table manually, right?
`dynamic row size` could be set at Database size, or SQL statement, if I remember this right.
mysql 5.6 is not supported！

Is there any document for upgrade?
here is my upgrade procedure for upgrading from 6.0.0-beta to 6.0.0-GA(it may not be the best practice)
1: stop all backend servers
2: delete all old indexes of sw(you can delete all indexes that starting with the value of storage.elasticsearch.nameSpace)
3: upgrade all backend servers
4: upgrade all agent and restart all application that start with javaagent (I used sw for java app)
5: start all backend servers
You could do update in this way. But we don't have this document.

title: The UI cannot be accessed when a collector  hangs
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
 I have deployed the cluster, I found that after a collector is hanged, the UI is inaccessible.Does deploying cluster mode also require all nodes to survive? When I configure the listOfServers option of the webapp.yml file to be a partial node，"com.netflix.zuul.exception.ZuulException: Forwarding error" error occurs in the webapp.log file,Also, the agent's collector.backend_service parameter configures all nodes. ,Will the data be lost when some nodes are hanged ?
___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
skywalking 6..0.0-GA
OS :centos 7.3
JRE:1.8
- Which company or project?

- What happen?
If possible, provide a way for reproducing the error. e.g. demo application, component version.
How to configure can guarantee that my program is still normal when a node hangs, including page access
___
### Requirement or improvement
- Please describe about your requirements or improvement suggestions.
author: liyongfa0311

comments.body: UI is querying the collector. So collector break down, UI would work.

I know  UI would work.But collector break down, it will have 500 errors.I want to know how to configure to avoid this problem. And will  the data uploaded by the agent  be lost when the cluster is normal and some collector break down？
If the data is in the process, definitely they are lost. The easy way, put a load balance between agent and backend cluster could help.

title: Loss of metadata causes the server to fail to start properly
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ ] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [x] Feature or performance improvement


##  Requirement or improvement
### background
When the user upgrades SkyWalking, the data model of the old and new versions is inconsistent, causing the server to fail to start properly. At this time, the user may adopt the method of clearing the library.
The registration data is lost. The interface will not be able to display the statistical indicators reported by the client that lacks registration information. At the same time, because under the existing mechanism,
The user needs to restart the client to complete the re-registration operation, but the business system restart is not acceptable because of the monitoring system problem.
So we need a mechanism to re-register without restarting the business system.

### ideas
The registration data is lost on the server side and there are two compensation measures:
* Push the registration data cached by the client to the server again, but the ID of the registration data in the cache may have been occupied by other newly registered clients.
Solving such problems is costly.
* Reset the registration data of the problem client. The key elements of this solution are how to identify the problem client and how to send the command to the problem client.

### Key issues
#### Uniquely identifies
At present, the client automatically generates a globally unique process_uuid as the unique identifier of the client instance. However, the ID of the client cannot be accurately located by the operation and maintenance personnel. Therefore, the startup file and startup parameters are required. Add the client instance name attribute, which is manually specified when the user deploys.
Because the recovery function is not a necessary function of the system, as a non-essential option, the ability to automatically generate the original global unique process_uuid is retained. The original process_uuid is overwritten only when the user specifies the client instance name in the startup file or startup parameters.
In order to avoid modifying the 5.x protocol, the other language probes are linked to the upgrade, and the attributes of the instance name are added in the heartbeat interface of the 6.x protocol.

#### Problem finding
The client whose registration data is missing is not aware of it. Only the server can find the data reported by the client. If the trace details are reported in the trace interface, the size of the trace details is too large and the performance is too large. Therefore, consider the heartbeat interface of the instance to discover the problem client. However, only the instance ID is reported in the heartbeat interface. And friendly prompts, you need to modify this interface, add the instance name attribute in the interface.
Check the ID and instance name at the same time, and prompt in the error log information to check the problematic instance information.

### Directive is issued
Considering the background of this solution is a very useful function, the instruction does not need to be sent to the client through the server, and the client is directly logged in to the client.
The instruction to reset the registration data, while considering the security problem, can not open the network interface to the client to receive the instruction, so the file scanning and listening mode are used to issue the instruction.
Considering the friendliness of the operator after the command is issued, the client will modify the status information in the file to inform the execution of the reset command.
author: Liu-XinYuan

comments.body: Auto reset from UI command is in this milestone, let's see whether it will deliver in time.
Since 6.3.0, automatically hot reboot supported.

title: how to erase oversize data in ES gracefully
body: hello, we created many trace data in ES in production environment, when we delete all of the nodes data directly in ES we encountered UI not available, always pops up 500 error, util we set up a new skywalking collector and restart the agents. So do we have a graceful way to erase the useless data in ES without restart or redeploy the collectors and agents ?
author: liu316484231

comments.body: the skywalking version we use is 5.0GA

Deleting data in ElasticSearch is not very high performance. The suggestions are
1. Set the ElasticSearch with more nodes.
1. Set a very long TTL to make it disable, and write your own scripts/codes to implement TTL at night
1. Similar with (2), contribute the codes to use, which support deleting data at several certain time points each day if you want to contribute to us.

title: how to set a unique name for each service instance nodes?
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [x] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- What do you want to know?
In the service map page, we find that all Host field's value is filled with [localhost], our question is that how to set a unique name for each service instance nodes? we can not find the related setting variable in the agent config file. or what determined the Host field's value in skywalking.

- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
6.0.0-beta
author: foxracle

comments.body: Hostname is based on your OS hostname, agent just collect it.

Thanks for your quick reply!
Could you tell me the details about how to collect the OS hostname, because related the 'hostname' of OS, we may mean different things. the hostname showed in service map page is not the same as the output of hostname command of OS(ubuntu 14.04).
No. That name would not show in service map. Service map is based on service code, not hostname. In real production env, hostname is unique for each vm or container.
when service instance nodes is one vm like aliyun's ecs, what does the 'hostname' mean. we install sw into our services using javaagent method, and our service is run in one tomcat with war package.
OS hostname has just one meanings.  What do you expect? I am confusing. I feel you are creating your own concept.

As a user, we just want to know which service instance nodes the service is now running. but we now can only find string like this on service map page: [Ins:web-pid:32016@localhost Throughput]. [Ins:web-pid:32016@nodexxx Throughput] is what we expect. so we want to know where the [localhost] come from?
It is OS hostname. You could find tons of documents about how to set OS hostname in Google or Baidu.
the question is that we have set a unique hostname for every machine, but on service map page all machine show as  localhost
That depends on JVM. We use JVM API to get that. So you could easily test it by a simple demo java app.
thank you, we will check it

title: How get the request params from get or post
body: In trace，can not found the params，where see or not supported? version 5.0
author: yuxiao97

comments.body:
We don't support that. If you dive a little deeper for this requirements, you will find actually this is complex. Such as
- Decoding of the HTTP parameter is uncertain, if decode wrong, it will break the application.
- Some stream reader doesn't allow pre-read.
- Performance concern, this is possible only if you are a low throughput system. Tag this parameter will cost a lot of memory, network, and storage.

So, this requirement could be done only in your own env and change the certain plugin.

author: tianmingxing

comments.body: No service discovery in 6.x. Are you using 5.x agent to connect 6's backend?
Yes, the version of the agent I use is 5.x. Is it normal after upgrading to 6.x?
For considering cloud native, the load balance is not skywalking agent responsibility. So removed in 6.x. If you want to use 6.x backend, please upgrade the agents. No big change in agent core.
Can work normally, thank you.

title: search_phase_execution_exception while query doc size greater than 10 thousand
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ ] Question or discussion
- [X] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Bug
- Which version of SkyWalking, OS and JRE?
skywalking5&6, es5&6
- Which company or project?

- What happen?

#### 1. error:
```
Exception while fetching data (/queryBasicTraces) : Elasticsearch exception [type=search_phase_execution_exception, reason=all shards failed]
```
In fact, this problem also exists in the online demo.
#### 2. Scene recurrence
You can copy the following request content：
```
{
    "variables":{
        "condition":{
            "traceState":"ALL",
            "queryOrder":"BY_START_TIME",
            "paging":{
                "pageNum":53,
                "pageSize":200,
                "needTotal":true
            },
            "queryDuration":{
                "start":"2018-09",
                "end":"2018-11",
                "step":"MONTH"
            }
        }
    },
    "query":"
        query BasicTraces($condition: TraceQueryCondition) {
        queryBasicTraces(condition: $condition) {
        traces {
        key: segmentId
        endpointNames
        duration
        start
        isError
        traceIds
        }
        total
        }
        }"
}
```

Submitting the request will give an error. **This is a problem with ElasticSearch DB.** If the value of from+size exceeds 10000 when paging, the ES data will not be found. Request above 53*200+200>10000.
author: simuhunluo

comments.body: Why do you want to go to this page?
If you want, every database could be blocked by this kind of issue. Paging for every database, no matter NoSQL or traditional DB, can't survive. You could try:)
Scala out your ElasticSearch cluster, or make timeout longer, is your only option.

title: CPM data is not allowed
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue.

- Why do you submit this issue?
- [ √] Question or discussion
- [ ] Bug
- [ ] Requirement
- [ ] Feature or performance improvement

___
### Question
- Hello, the number of requests I make per minute is 500, but the CPM shows that it's going on at 150. I've been measuring for a long time, and this question has puzzled me all the time.

___
### Bug
- version 5.0GA
author: AaronChenlin

comments.body:
That depends, I don't know it is a bug or not yet. Haven't received any report about this before. But in theory, it could be less than 500. Traces are collected in your process by agent and transport by network, also with backend analysis, for keeping your application safe, we set a lot of mechanism to ignore traces if your backend, network and agent-side cpu are overloads.

You need to figure out, first thing, does the trace data support your 500cpm? 
Seconds, do you give the same(500cpm) payloads in your query duration? Also, check the trend graph, it should show you cpm in each minutes, which should verify this.

title: Greenwich problem
body:
hi，this is the problem i meet. 
when I using the skywalking and elasticSearch with this under version:
apache-skywalking-apm-incubating-5.0.0-GA
elasticsearch-5.6.8

after start all the application ,i found the system time become the Greenwich . 
i am in China ~ =- =

so~
i can't query data Within 8 hour. 

how to set the Time zone for skywalking and elasticSearch ???
author: NeilZZ

comments.body: The data depends on your agent time zone and time. Try to set your os time right.
but after i reset the os time and clear all the data and log. it still the same.
You need restart your application. Then easy way, write a java app to read time, system current millionseconds. See what is happening. Linux has a lot of ways to set time. Make sure Jvm could read it

i already resolved it. it is not the os problem, this issue is because install 2 kinds jdk. i need to add 
-Duser.timezone=Asia/Shanghai
into the JAVA_OPTS of the file: 
collectorService.sh
webappService.sh
That is one way. You could set time zone in os too. Many ways to do this

no. in my case , the second jdk can't able to read the os time zone. i don't know why .
but i think, maybe you can add the time zone into the setting properties file. 
it might be very helpful~
No, we can't. Because we have users in global. We don't know the right time zone
you can default read the os time zone . but have some options in the configuration file

I add -Duser.timezone=UTC in webappService.sh
but not change UI timezone.
You could choose UI timezone.
